name: 13th FLOOR
description:
STORY :The story is about Security Guard on his night shift at university. He found many paranormal activities on the 10th - 13th floor what are those things? You have to figure it out by yourself! HOW TO PLAY :W A S D - walk F - Flash light E - Interact TEAM MEMBER
